author: cnbc.com
title: Wayfinder Holdings, LLC Acquires Autumn Cove Assisted Living and Memory Care in Anniston, Alabama
text:
MOUNT PLEASANT, S.C., Feb. 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Wayfinder Holdings, LLC is pleased to announce the acquisition of Autumn Cove Assisted Living and Memory Care, a 65-unit senior living community in Anniston, Alabama.
Eric Hadley, President of Wayfinder Management, says Autumn Cove is simply a great fit. Mr. Hadley goes on to say that Autumn Cove is a well-respected, single site community that will nicely be in tandem with our structure and culture and we are excited to grow with this level of intention.
The acquisition took place on January 1, 2018 and involved the following, well respected senior living acquisition team:
Brokerage Services:
Senturian Senior Housing Brokerage
Watson McCollister, Broker
Legal Representation:
Baker Donelson
Richard Faulkner, Lead Counsel
Financing Representation:
Lancaster Pollard
Gerald Swiacki, Vice President
Lending:
United Community Bank
Denis Rowlend, Vice President
Contemporary Healthcare Capital
Steve McGee, Partner
About Wayfinder: Based in Mount Pleasant, South Carolina, Wayfinder owns, manages and develops senior living communities. Wayfinder seeks intentional growth with a desire to preserve local community presence and identity. The Southeast is our primary geography. Senior living; including independent living, assisted living and memory care, is our core purpose. www.wayfindermgmt.com .
If you would like more information about this topic, please contact Eric Hadley at ehadley@wayfindermgmt.com .
